Description: Cascio Music's scratch & dent items have been deemed to no longer be sellable in new condition due to customer return, shipping damage or normal use. These items are given a very basic inspection prior to listing. We are offering this playable and unique Dean electric guitar at a discount. This electric guitar displays minor signs of use and wear. The guitar has some minor buckle rash on the back, scratches on the bottom of the guitar, and a minor crack on the body of the guitar next to the neck. None of these issues affect the playability of this guitar. The electronics are in working condition and work as intended. The guitar comes with a Floyd Rose tremolo system and the tremolo arm. This item is sold AS-IS and does not include warranty. The fretboard is fast and the DMT design pickups growl. Featuring the Pantera Far Beyond Drive Graphic, the Dean Dimebag Far Beyond Driven ML Electric Guitar is every metal players dream. See listing for eligibility. UPS Next Day Air Saver, UPS 2nd Day Air and UPS 3 Day Select orders placed prior to 1p CST (M-F) will ship out on the same business day.We provide tracking on all orders. Tracking will post as soon as we receive it from our distribution center. In the very unlikely event that your item is lost or damaged during shipping, please contact us and we will be happy to assist you. Communication The eBay messaging system allows you to securely communicate with us regarding future and existing orders. In order to provide the best possible service to you on eBay, we ask that all communication be done directly through the eBay messaging system.
